body_html:
I followed below step to install Tensorflow

  1. Installe Python 3.5.2 on window7 machine.
  2. With the help of PIP, i installed Tensorflow
    pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
    pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu

pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow

body:
I followed below step to install Tensorflow
1. Installe Python 3.5.2 on window7 machine.
2. With the help of PIP, i installed Tensorflow 
      pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow 
     pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu
